channel.title: Season 4 on horse life 98
channel.description: Recent content in Season 4 on horse life 98

item.title: food
item.description: another one of those comics with an obscure reference to Québec culture but at least you have Raymond from Animal Crossing I don’t even play Animal Crossing lol

item.title: impostor
item.description: today’s comic is so sus it has a bonus panel and yes the host in the last panel is supposed to be Guy Jodoin’s evil twin brother, Guyves, who replaced Guy on the set of Le Tricheur

item.title: vtuber
item.description: today, Yuki is a cute internet girl with a commodore 64

item.title: hippo
item.description: featuring Walrii from CodeWalrus and another one of those weird Canadian PSAs

item.title: tv
item.description: today on horse life 98 we kill a tv if you’re canadian like me I hope you remember this particular tv

item.title: bliss
item.description: you wish everything will go back to normal but will it ever go back to normal who knows happy 50th strip (yes that’s the Windows XP hill, credits to Google Street View)

item.title: comeback
item.description: Guess what, season 4 of Horse Life 98??? whaaaat Now with a new character design I drew myself and not with some weird Flash app I found on the Internets that isn’t supported anymore by major browser vendors, because I can I’ll probably never finish Paneltober, though
